text: up to a hundred talents of silver,7:22 100 talents is approximately 3.77 tons or 3.42 metric tons of silver. a hundred cors of wheat,7:22 100 cors is approximately 624 bushels or 22,000 liters (probably about 19.2 tons or 17.4 metric tons of wheat). a hundred baths of wine,7:22 100 baths is approximately 580 gallons or 2,200 liters of wine. a hundred baths of olive oil,7:22 Or 100 baths of oil; that is, approximately 580 gallons or 2,200 liters and salt without limit.
